LanguageData.MakeAmmo_88mmRPzB_HEAT.label: make RPzB Gr. 4992 HEAT rocket x5
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_88mmRPzB_HEAT.description: Craft RPzB Gr. 4992 HEAT rocket, the standard issued shape charge anti-tank rocket for RPzB 54/1, with nearly no fragments and 180mm armor penetration.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_88mmRPzB_Frag.label: make RPzB Gr. 4992 Frag rocket x3
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_88mmRPzB_Frag.description: Craft RPzB Gr. 4992 Fragmentation rocket, Modified rocket for RPzB 54/1, with improved fragmentation effects but really weak explosive damage.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_8cmRVW_HE.label: make 8cm Raketen Sprgr(HE) rocket x3
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_8cmRVW_HE.description: Craft 8cm Raketen Sprpr, modified high explosive rockets for Raketen-Vielfachwerfer, it contain better explosive charge than the standard RPzB rockets.
